flawed_nl_solution:
The first movie was 2*60=<<2*60=120>>120 minutes
So this movie is 120*0.6=<<120*0.6=27>>27 minutes longer
So this movie is 147 minutes
It also cost 50*2=$<<50*2=100>>100 per minute to film
So it cost 147*100=$14700

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72.0, not 27.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
